title: Leboncoin Scraper
description: Scrape Leboncoin listings from search URLs

urls_list.title: Search URLs *
urls_list.description: Enter one or more Leboncoin search URLs (must contain /recherche in the path). Category URLs (e.g. /cl/...) are not supported. This field is required.
urls_list.sectionDescription: Scrape one or multiple searches in a single run

max_pages.title: Max pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of pages to scrape. Set 0 to scrape all available pages (practical limit of 99999 pages). Recommended: 10-20 to start.

limit_per_page.title: Ads per page
limit_per_page.description: Number of ads to scrape per page (Leboncoin typically displays 35 ads/page)

delay_between_pages.title: Delay between pages (seconds)
delay_between_pages.description: Wait time between each page (0 = maximum speed recommended)

max_age_days.title: Max ad age (days)
max_age_days.description: Ignore ads older than X days (0 = disabled)

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use proxies to avoid blocking (recommended for high volume)
